overview: "A hand-painted film by Mahine ROUHI made using blades of grass, stones, a buzzard's feather and Chinese ink. The film was then printed and modified with an optical printer during a residency at MIRE's workspace (Nantes)." -Olivier FOUCHARD "A big sheet to protect the table, some stones, a bird's feather and a variety of foliages â€“ Chinese ink - to dip, put down, grate, remove, go over it again and to let it dry." - Mahine ROUHI
title: Tamis
